Okay so in this case the failure was server side sending of the notification email. Currently we parse the returned page to confirm successful submission so if an error of this (odd) nature occurs we are left in an unusual state.  For now you either need to keep using the web ui to create new bug reports, or resolve the smtp issues.  Once we adopt the new (Bugzilla 3.0) web services api, our error recovery from this sort of error should improve (see bug#154785).  I will rename this bug report to reflect our new understanding of the problem and will mark as won't fix for now.
